official-title.#text:
To amend title 38, United States Code, to make certain improvements in the laws administered by the
			 Secretary of Veterans Affairs relating to training and rehabilitation for
			 veterans with service-connected disabilities, and for other purposes.

quote.#tail:
means a significant impairment, resulting from the service-connected disability, that is directly
			 related to the veteran’s ability to prepare for, obtain, or retain

			 interests.
